block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$680,000 147 West 15th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a loft building; elevator, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,450, 54% tax-deductible, listed at $700,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Ambrose Mar-Elia; Bellmarc)

$120,000 350 Cabrini Boulevard 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doorman, dining foyer, sunken living room, Hudson River view; maintenance $922, 44% tax-deductible, listed at $125,000, 9 weeks on market (Broker: Simone Song Properties)

$722,500 23 Christopher Street 5-family, 4-story brownstone in need of extensive renovation to be made into a one-family residence; five 400-sq.-ft studios with one bath on upper floors; 800 sq. ft. of commercial space on ground floor; rear garden; taxes $9,264, listed at $799,000, 26 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner Associates)

$315,000 160 East 38th Street (Murray Hill Mews) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, hardwood floors, East River view, health club; maintenance $1,491, 70% tax-deductible, listed at $330,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Clayman-Iskowitz)

$525,000 135 West 70th Street (Pythian) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,450-sq.-ft. prewar condo; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, new windows, south exposure; common charge $795; taxes $6,000, listed at $550,000, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$375,000 90 Horton Street 8-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 100-year-old Victorian; dining room, powder room, porch, gazebo, in need of extensive rehabilitation, 50- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000, listed at $400,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

$290,000 62 Second Street 3-family, brick and brownstone building; eat-in kitchen in parlor and garden floor units; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in each; hardwood floors; taxes $2,000, listed at $295,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Landmark)

$283,000 1783 East 26th Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 60-year-old detached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, front porch, 2-car garage, 40- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,600, listed at $285,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacob Gold)

$362,000 345 6th Street 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 3-story brownstone; double parlor, eat-in kitchen, library, parquet floors, 2 marble mantels, skylight, rear porch; taxes $1,300, listed at $375,000, 35 weeks on market (Broker: Warren Lewis)

$288,000 75-36 Kessel Street 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 50-year-old semi-attached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, skylight, finished basement, 1-car garage, 25- by 105-ft. lot; taxes $1,400, listed at $319,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Kingdom)

$260,000 11-30 Whitestone Expressway 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 51-year-old brick ranch; fireplace, hardwood floors, in-ground pool, new heating system, 73- by 103-ft. lot; taxes $2,442, listed at $275,000, 56 weeks on market (Broker: REMAX/Universal)

$525,000 55 Flagg Place 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 27-year-old detached brick ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, harbor view, 2-car garage, 134- by 138-ft. lot; taxes $6,900, listed at $595,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Vitali-Sunshine)

$457,000 6 Ridge Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 29-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car attached garage; taxes $6,200, listed at $499,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Long Island)

$185,000 14 Columbus Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 30-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with fireplace, solarium, 2-car garage; taxes $6,300, listed at $219,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio Associates)
$600,000 16 Shady Brook Road 6-bedroom, 6 1/2-bath, 50-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2-car garage, 0.75 acre; taxes $8,900, listed at $699,500, 12 months on market (Broker: Turnkey)

$262,500 156 North Country Road 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 89-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, wrap-around porch, carriage house, greenhouse, in historic district; taxes $3,800, listed at $310,000, 57 weeks on market (Broker: ERA Manzoni)

$300,000 6 Bragdon Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 10-year-old contemporary; cathedral ceilings, sun room, enclosed porch, finished basement, .95-acre lot; taxes $5,006, listed at $309,900, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Raveis; William Pitt)

$1.305 million 25 Lindsay Drive 3-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, 29-year-old ranch; breakfast area, 3 fireplaces, slate roof, c/a, terrace, 3-car garage, 2-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $11,508, listed at $1.395 million, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$825,000 19 Indian Head Road 5-bedroom, 4 full and 2 half-bath, 84-year-old colonial; center hall, dining room, eat-in kitchen, butler's pantry, sun room, fireplace, .6-acre lot; taxes $5,963, listed at $895,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt)

$1.15 million 209 Dolphin Cove Quay (Dolphin Cove) 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 23-year-old contemporary, remodeled in 1991; cherry-wood kitchen, vaulted ceilings, solarium, deep-water mooring, .23-acre lot; taxes $16,799, listed at $1.225 million, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Raveis; William Pitt)

$169,000 19 Greenvale Circle 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 49-year-old colonial; entry hall, dining room, partially finished basement, wooded lot; .25 acre; taxes $4,600, listed at $169,000, 25 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Wolff)

$312,000 65 Oak Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 39-year-old split-level; eat-in kitchen, French doors, Palladian windows; 1/2 acre; taxes $7,832, listed at $325,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Randolph Properties; Holmes & Kennedy)

$210,000 6 Raynor Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 68-year-old Mediterranean; cathedral beamed ceilings, fireplace, modern eat-in kitchen, attached 2-car garage; taxes $5,056, listed at $229,500, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Lindsey)

$406,666 528 Manor Ridge Raod 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 68-year-old colonial; entry hall, modern eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces; taxes $10,127, listed at $425,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: McClellan & Co.)

$220,000 25 Wilts Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 32-year-old colonial; family room, deck, h/w floors, full basement; taxes $4,904, listed at $228,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Higgins; Coldwell Banker)
$252,000 509 East Atlantic Boulevard 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 38-year-old ranch; fireplace, c/a; taxes $3,871, listed at $259,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Richards)

$1.7 million 53 White Oak Drive 5-bedroom, 5-bath, 7-year-old stone and stucco Tudor; 3-car garage, great room with marble floor and stone fireplace, in-ground pool with hot tub, formal gardens, 2.5-acre lot; taxes $31,033, listed at $1.795 million, 8 months on market (Broker: N.T. Callaway)
$425,000 1 Stratford Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; central vacuum, security system, intercom; taxes $9,589, listed at $429,900, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$406,666 528 Manor Ridge Raod 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 68-year-old colonial; entry hall, modern eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces; taxes $10,127, listed at $425,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: McClellan & Co.)

$220,000 25 Wilts Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 32-year-old colonial; family room, deck, h/w floors, full basement; taxes $4,904, listed at $228,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Higgins; Coldwell Banker)
